generations: Article: (CNN)James Best, best known for his portrayal of bumbling sheriff Rosco P. Coltrane on TV's "The Dukes of Hazzard," died Monday after a brief illness. He was 88.
references:
James Best, who played the sheriff on "The Dukes of Hazzard," died Monday at 88 .
"Hazzard" ran from 1979 to 1985 and was among the most popular shows on TV .
